design_philosophy.core_concept: Authentic Congolese warmth meets French Brasserie structure. A sensory experience of earth, fire, and spice.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Organic Modernism. No flat colorsâ€”everything has depth or texture.

headings.usage: All H1, H2, H3. Use for emotional impact.

usage_rules.background_strategy: Never use pure white (#FFFFFF) for the main page background. Use 'Warm Sand' (#F4F1DE).
usage_rules.gradient_strategy: Avoid linear gradients. Use radial gradients for 'spotlight' effects on food.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure #3D405B is used for body text for softness, but switch to #1A1C23 for small text if readability fails.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-16 for section padding. Allow the content to breathe.
layout_strategies.mobile_first: Stack vertically on mobile, expand to asymmetric grid on lg screens.

buttons.base_classes: bg-primary text-primary-foreground px-8 py-4 font-bold shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-200
buttons.secondary_classes: bg-transparent border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground

cards.base_classes: bg-card rounded-2xl shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] border border-border/20 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.base_classes: bg-white/50 border-b-2 border-primary/30 focus:border-primary focus:bg-white transition-colors rounded-t-md px-4 py-3

navigation.base_classes: fixed top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-lg flex gap-6 items-center

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' overlay (opacity 0.03) on the entire body to mimic paper/grain.
visual_enhancers.border_radius: rounded-2xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

principles: Parallax effect on food images during scroll.

hero_section.usage: Full width hero background or large featured image.

ambiance_section.usage: Background for reviews or location section.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on #E07A5F (Primary) is #F4F1DE (Light Sand) or White. Do not use black on primary.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Copy the color palette into tailwind.config.js extending the theme.
3. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build the 'ReviewForm' using Shadcn Form + Input, but style it with the 'Organic Card' aesthetics defined above.
4. MAPS: Use an iframe for Google Maps (2 Rue Pierre de Ronsard 41000 Blois) inside a rounded-2xl container with overflow-hidden.
5. TRANSLATION: Implement a simple state-based toggle (FR/EN) that switches text content. No complex i18n library needed for MVP.
6. REVIEWS: Mock the MongoDB connection if backend is not ready, but build the UI to handle dynamic rating averages.
7. NOISE TEXTURE: Add a fixed position div with a noise background image and pointer-events-none to overlay the whole site.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are mandatory.
